html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-02722025-03-05AAFC
ActFarm Income Protection Act
SubjectOrder authorizing the Minister to enter into agreements with provinces and territories to assist Hog producers.
PrecisOrder authorizing Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to enter into the AGREEMENTS with provinces and territories in order to provide federal contributions of up to $567.16 million to assist with the extraordinary costs incurred by hog producers impacted by the closure of key export markets to Canadian pork and hogs due to an outbreak of African Swine Fever, from the day an outbreak occurs for up to twelve months following the closure of key export markets.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada to enter into the AGREEMENTS with provinces and territories in order to provide federal contributions of up to $567.16 million to assist with the extraordinary costs incurred by hog producers impacted by the closure of key export markets to Canadian pork and hogs due to an outbreak of African Swine Fever, from the day an outbreak occurs for up to twelve months following the closure of key export markets.
